<!--  -->
<div class="text-base">text-base</div>

<!-- Supported attributes -->
<div class="text-xs"></div>
<div className="text-xs"></div>

<!-- Quotes -->
<div className="text-sm"></div>
<div className='text-sm'></div>
<div className={'text-sm'}></div>

<!-- One attribute per line -->
<div class="text-lg"><div class="text-lg"></div></div>

<!-- Multi-line attributes are ignored -->
<div class="text-white
 bg-black"></div>

<!-- Comments are processed -->
<!-- <div class="text-xl"></div> -->

<!-- Escaped characters in attribute value -->
<div class="font-[\"Roboto\"]"></div>

<!-- Whitespace normalization -->
<div class=" mt-1  mr-2   mb-3    ml-4  ">

<!-- Non-greedy match -->
<div class="text-2xl" id="id">
